description.translate: No heat, by the stones or by the cold wind until the future. Alone, it lies.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§5Gemme-cœur abandonné\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Aucune chaleur, par les pierres ou par le vent\"}","{\"text\":\"§7froid jusqu'à l'avenir. Seul, il demeure.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7No heat, by the stones or by the cold wind\"}","{\"text\":\"§7until the future. Alone, it lies.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a3 §7HUN§a1 §7DAR§c-2\"}"]}}
